name: Napa County Housing Authority
description: Section 8 housing vouchers for Napa County residents
fullDescription: The Housing Authority of the City of Napa administers Section 8 vouchers and affordable housing programs for low-income residents in Napa County.
whatTheyOffer:
- Section 8 Housing Choice Vouchers
- Public housing
- Project-based vouchers
- Family self-sufficiency program
howToGetIt:
1. Check Housing Authority website for waitlist status
2. Apply when waitlist opens
3. Must meet income limits
4. Napa County residents get preference
5. Wait for name on waitlist
keywords: Napa Housing Authority, Section 8, housing voucher, Napa, wine country, low-income, waitlist
